input_args.passage: 'Libby Mitchell - Wikipedia | Mitchell represented the 24th State Senate District from 2004 to 2010. She was also the Speaker of the Maine House of Representatives and as President of the Maine Senate (2008–2010), becoming the first woman in the United States to have held both positions, and the third person ever to do so.'
input_args.claim: 'Therefore, we can conclude that Libby Mitchell is a political figure, specifically a former senator and legislative leader from Maine.'
